239 continuing to knit in the same i cord edge + left edge decrease pattern as row 211 & 212 knit until row 239 introducing cc blue 2 cc lavender 1 & cc green 1 as needed the thistle motif is 10 stitches wide and is repeated 8 times across the width of the scarf with the final flower on the left edge being knitted from the chart place stitch markers every 10 sts as appropriate cut cc cc blue 2 cc lavender 1 & cc green 1 leaving tails to sew in later rejoin mc white stitch count 3 + 89+ 3 = 95 copyright 2024 suzi ashworth for folkestone harbour yarn day 14 mesembryanthemum row 217 - 225 continuing to knit in the same i cord edge + left edge decrease pattern as row 211 & 212 knit until row 225 introducing cc pink 2 cc pink 1 & cc green 2 as needed the mesembryanthemum motif is 14 stitches wide and is repeated 6 times across the width of the scarf with the final 2 flowers on the left edge being knitted from the chart place stitch markers every 14 sts as appropriate note that all motifs in this half of the mini shawlwill be knitted upside down this is so that when you tie the mini shawl around your neck or head both sides will appear symmetrical and the right way round cut cc pink 2 cc pink 1 & cc green 2 leaving tails to sew in later stitch count 3 + 97+ 3 = 103 this pattern is for personal non-commercial use only the pattern may not be copied resold or redistributed in any way day 13 ladybirds row 204 - 210 continuing to knit in the same i cord edge + left edge increase pattern as row 9 & 10 knit until row 210 introducing cc almost black & cc red 1 as needed the ladybird motif is 17 stitches wide and is repeated 5 times across the width of the scarf with the final ladybird on the left edge being knitted from the chart place stitch markers every 17 sts as appropriate row 211 216 the i cord edge stays the same but the left edge starts to decrease i have marked the decreases in pale yellow for this chart only as a reminder row 211 ws k3 purl 2 together p2tog purl across row until 3 sts from end slip the last 3 sts purl-wise wyif turn work row 212 rs k until 3 sts from end including colourwork from chart slip the last 3 sts purl-wise wyif turn work all following odd numbered/ws row as per row 211 all following even numbered/rs row as per row 212 cut cc almost black
